Html:
Hi Radioman,

I enjoy your work every day... with Visual Studio. From time to time, I must debug my application on a computer with very little memory and where Visual Studio is simply not usable.

I have tried with SharpDevelop (both 3.2 and 4.1) but the Gmap control cannot be opened and edited.

When I simply open the solution (from source code) and try to run Demo.WindowsForms I have the following errors:

1. ${res:ICSharpCode.Build.CannotFindFxCop}

2. Erreur de génération inconnue, 'MC3074 : la balise 'GMapControlNew' n'existe pas dans l'espace de noms XML 'clr-namespace:GMap.NET.WindowsPresentation;assembly=GMap.NET.WindowsPresentation'. Ligne 7 Position 10.'  (MC1000) - C:\Documents and Settings\SE\Bureau\VMSmap\greatmaps_91cea904e3d7\Testing\WPF-GMapControlNew\MainWindow.xaml:7,10

This opens without any problem with VS... any thoughts

Is anyone familiar with SD environment? Maybe a configuration issue...

Thanks for your help.
...you can try remove WPF-GMapControlNew project from solution in visual studio, save, and then try to load it in SharpDevelop

Thanks for your quick answer.

Still get the first error:

${res:ICSharpCode.Build.CannotFindFxCop}

What target framework? I tried several possibilities. No change :-(
open properties for BSE.Windows.Forms, goto Code Analysis and uncheck first checkbox

I have 2 checkboxes in "Code Analysis" and both are unchecked already.

Have tried to "Add/Remove rule assembly" but does not change anything...

Still open, sorry
i've removed first checkbox, builds fine on SharpDevelop, get new version and check

Now I have the following errors... strange:

L'importation du fichier de clé "MyPFX.pfx" a été annulée. (MSB3321)

Impossible d'importer le fichier de clé suivant : MyPFX.pfx. Le fichier de clé est peut-être protégé par mot de passe. Pour corriger ce problème, essayez d'importer de nouveau le certificat ou installez manuellement le certificat dans le fournisseur de services de chiffrement de nom fort avec le nom de conteneur de clé suivant : VS_KEY_4E74F71058E245D9 (MSB3325)

Erreur de génération inconnue, 'MC3074 : la balise 'GMapControlNew' n'existe pas dans l'espace de noms XML 'clr-namespace:GMap.NET.WindowsPresentation;assembly=GMap.NET.WindowsPresentation'. Ligne 7 Position 10.'  (MC1000) - C:\Documents and Settings\SE\Bureau\VMSmap\greatmaps_4953ab25be55\Testing\WPF-GMapControlNew\MainWindow.xaml:7,10

;-(
